item.title: Megan Nguyen - Black belt test May 2023
item.description: May 27, 2023 Megan Nguyen: Tessting to 1st Dan Saturday May 27, 2023 10:00 AM Atlee Rec Center Atlee Station Road Mechanicsville, VA Everyone is invited to attend. Brown belts are invited to attend in uniform.

item.title: Sarah Nguyen - Black belt test May 2023
item.description: May 27, 2023 Sarah Nguyen: Tessting to black belt Saturday May 27, 2023 10:00 AM Atlee Rec Center Atlee Station Road Mechanicsville, VA Everyone is invited to attend. Brown belts are invited to attend in uniform.

item.title: Sensei Kha - Black Bel Test May 2023
item.description: May 13, 2023 All, I am happy to announce that I have been nominated for fifth dan black belt which comes with the Master title. My promotion will be held this Saturday(5/13) at 10:00 AM at the karate school in Annandale. This is an experience that I'd like to share with my peers, colleagues, and especially my students(past and present) and their family. I would like to invite everyone to attend.

item.title: Thoughts from master thinh
item.description: Thoughts from Master Thinh On the topic of kata, focus, and long term personal gain.

item.title: Important dates (2023)
item.description: Important Dates 2023 This page will be updated regularly. Day Status Notes March 3-4, 2023 Closed (no class) FCPS holiday March 10, 2023 Monthly Demonstration practice 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM March TBD, 2023 Open (regular class) Spring activity April 29, 2023 TBD second quarter demonstration April 3 - 7, 2023 Closed (no class) spring break April 22, 2023 Open (no class) Karate test, Annandale, VA April 28, 2023 Monthly Demonstration practice 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM April 29, 2023 Closed, No Class.

item.title: Thoughts from master thinh
item.description: Thoughts from Master Thinh If you can control yourself, you can control anything. On the topic of self-control and maintaining your composure during sparring and in situations where you are unconfortable.

item.title: Promotion to black belt
item.description: One prerequisite for bromotion to black belt will be that advanced brown belts will be required to demonstrate competency in running class while working out with said class. This includes: Leading the student oath Warmups Basics Drills Forms 1 step sparring (No free sparring, no board breaking) An instructor will be present at all times. Standard and intermefdiate brown belt students may be asked to participate in running small portions of the class.

item.title: Kha's Karate Test Schedule(2023)
item.description: Test Schedule 2023 Rank Belt Test Quarter Time First quarter test Saturday January 14, 2023 10:00 AM, Annandale, Virginia Second quarter test Saturday April 15, 2023 10:00 AM, Annandale, Virginia Third quarter test Saturday July 15, 2023 10:00 AM, Annandale, Virginia Fourth quarter test Saturday, October 14, 2023 10:00 AM, Annandale, Virginia Black Belt test Quarter Time Spring belt test TBD Fall black belt test TBD

item.title: Class Schedule Effective 10-1-2022
item.description: Class schedule (Effective 10-1-2022) Beginner Class I (White belts 8-and-under) Day Times Tuesday, Thursday 5:00 - 5:45 PM Beginner Class II (students 8-13 years old) Day Times Tuesday, Thursday 6:00 - 7:00 PM Saturday 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM 13 and over/family classes Day Times Monday, Wednesday 6:20 - 7:35 PM Saturday 11:15 AM- 12:30 PM Adult class Day Times TBD TBD Misc Day Times Private Lessons Upon request Orientation for new students Will be scheduled as needed Demonstration practice First Friday of each month 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM (subject to change) Monthly off mat activity one Sunday each month
